title: The Angry Video Game Nerd

episodes.title: Kid Icarus
episodes.plot: Let's take a look back at an alleged NES Classic, Kid Icarus. Does it stand up with the Titans of the Era, or is it a Mount Olympus of Poop?

episodes.title: Earthworm Jim Trilogy
episodes.plot: Feeling nostalgic for the days of gross-out humor and over-the-top cartoony wackiness, the Nerd plays the Earthworm Jim trilogy and sees if it still holds up.
